textBeforeTable: Size Chart Battle Rip 65% Polyester / 35% Cotton Ripstop Durable drawstring leg closures Fused pocket flaps for clean, professional look Drain holes in bellowed pockets Two back pockets with button flaps Two cargo pockets with button flaps Six-pocket design (four with button flaps) Button fly Reinforced seat and knee Adjustable waist tabs for secure fit Felled inseams, outseams and seat seams Sewn to military specification MIL-T-44047E It’s authentic in every way. The Propper BDU Trouser is sewn to military specification MIL-T-44047E, with felled seams and a reinforced seat and knee for maximum durability. Six pockets with fused flaps give you a clean, professional look. Use the adjustable waist tabs and durable drawstring leg closures for a secure fit.
